nz.govt.natlib.meta
Class ObjectHarvester

java.lang.Object
  nz.govt.natlib.meta.ObjectHarvester
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgressStopListener
public abstract class ObjectHarvester
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressStopListener

The base class for Harvesters. This class implements a few features, but is primarily an interface for concrete implementations.

Version:
1.0
Author:
unascribed
